document_description: The National Energy Plan 2008-2021 focuses on enabling the biofuels market, diversifying the energy mix by introducing renewable energy targets and reducing dependency on fossil fuel, promoting a more efficient transportation system based on clean energy, installing over 1,500 PV projects and developing a national education strategy to improve energy efficiency and consumption awareness among the population.  Since a 2010 amendment, the Institute of Electricity provides further incentives for companies and residences for deploying solar panels and biomass generation systems, including tax reliefs and investment support.
